text: ekarasi karana (viniscaya) dinaya venuven obava ekarasi karana dinadi (ehi phalavipaka oba dæna gannehuya). eyayi (pin, pav) elidarav vana dinaya. kavurun allahva visvasa kara, dæhæmi kriyavan karanneda, ohuge papayan ohugen æt kara, sadakal diyadahara galamin æti svargayanhida ohuva (allah vana) ohu ætulu karanneya. sadakalma evayehi ovun rændi sitinnaha. meya ati visala bhagyayaki
